segments.text: I see the woman, completely focused on drying that plate, unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water spills over the sink like a sad waterfall, pooling on the floor beneath her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains calm, almost serene, which is surprising given the impending disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel an anxious knot in my stomach as I watch the boy precariously balance on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl near him looks so hopeful, her hand reaching for the cookie jar, and it makes me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the sight of that overflowing sink and the water creeping closer to the cabinets makes me want to scream.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost as if the calmness of the garden outside is mocking the turmoil inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
